channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Last Northern White Rhinos And The Tech That Could Save Their Kind
item.description: NatGeo’s The Last Rhinos: A New Hope spotlights BioRescue’s use of IVF and stem cell science to save the last northern white rhinos from extinction.

item.title: ‘Peacemaker’ Season 2: James Gunn On That Wild Orgy Scene In Episode 1
item.description: "Peacemaker" Season 2 is back with Episode 1, which contains a shocking scene with John Cena that explains why the series has a TV-MA rating.

item.title: TikTok Booms In Europe Despite Threat Of U.S. Ban
item.description: Revenue from Chinese giant ByteDance’s short video app leapt up 38% to $6.3 billion last year in Europe even as it faces the threat of being banned in...

item.title: ‘Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution’ Review: Stylish Pixel Platforming
item.description: After over 20-years, Shantae Advance is finally out for everyone to play. Check out what I thought of this previously lost retro game.

item.title: From A Mission To A Movement: Redefining Support For America’s Military And Veteran Caregivers
item.description: Organizations like the Elizabeth Dole Foundation support the 14 million Americans serve as unpaid caregivers to injured, ill, or wounded veterans and ...

item.title: Centering
item.description: Conversations and projects usually revolve around an axis. It could be a goal or an urgency or a person. It might be the boss. Wondering what they wan...

item.title: The violinist problem

item.description: A screwdriver works because the handle is bigger than the screw. You can twist the handle with leverage, causing the screw to turn. The bigger the han...

item.title: “No” is an option
item.description: “Maybe” is the problem. If you’re serious, say, “yes.” And if it’s not for you, walk away. But endlessly reconsidering opportunities without forward m...
